mapper.insert: insert into tbl_program_board (intronum, title, content, category, link, adminid, compnum) values(seq_program_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{link}, #{adminId}, #{compnum})
mapper.select: select intronum , title , content , category , link , compnum , adminid , compnum from tbl_program_board where intronum = #{intronum}

select * from (select rownum rnum , g.INTRONUM , g.TITLE , g.CONTENT , g.CATEGORY , g.LINK , g.COMPNUM , g.regdate , g.name from (select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a.intronum order by a.imgnum) jang , a.name , a.intronum , a.title , a.CONTENT , a.CATEGORY , a.LINK , a.COMPNUM , a.regdate from (select b.imgnum , p.intronum , p.title , ff.name , p.CONTENT , p.CATEGORY , p.LINK , p.COMPNUM , p.regdate from tbl_img_board b , tbl_program_board p, tbl_img_file ff where b.INTRONUM(+) = p.INTRONUM and b.imgnum = ff.num(+) order by ff.name desc, p.intronum, b.imgnum) a) v where v.jang=1
ORDER by INTRONUM desc) g) WHERE (rnum >= #{pageStart} AND rnum <= #{pageEnd}) order by INTRONUM desc, regdate desc
SELECT COUNT(intronum) FROM tbl_program_board WHERE intronum > 0
select * from (select intronum , title , content , category , link , compnum , regdate from tbl_program_board where intronum > 0 ) where rownum <= #{page} order by intronum desc, regdate desc
select name, num from tbl_img_file where num IN(select imgnum from tbl_img_board WHERE intronum = #{introNum} and MAIN = 1)
select f.* from tbl_img_file f where f.num IN (select imgnum from tbl_img_board where intronum = #{introNum})
select f.* from tbl_img_file f where f.num IN (select imgnum from tbl_img_board)
select p.intronum , p.title from TBL_PROGRAM_BOARD p, TBL_COMPANY c where p.compnum = c.compnum AND p.compnum = #{num}
select p.intronum , p.title from TBL_PROGRAM_BOARD p, TBL_COMPANY c where p.compnum = c.compnum AND compname = #{compname}
